title: BERGDORF GOODMAN
seo_title: BERGDORF GOODMAN | WestHouse Hotel New York
seo_description: Bergdorf Goodman transformed this once Vanderbilt mansion into a midtown mainstay in 1928 with eight floors of pure designer bliss. BG Restaurant on the Seventh Floor is the perfect lunch spot after a day of shopping on Fifth Avenue, and for a quick bite, Goodman’s is also available on the Beauty Level.

Bergdorf Goodman transformed this once Vanderbilt mansion into a midtown mainstay in 1928 with eight floors of pure designer bliss. BG Restaurant on the Seventh Floor is the perfect lunch spot after a day of shopping on Fifth Avenue, and for a quick bite, Goodman’s is also available on the Beauty Level.
